original_text: And they drew Alexander out of the multitude, the Jews putting him forward. And Alexander beckoned with the hand, and would have made his defence unto the people.
korean_text: 유대인들이 무리 가운데서 알렉산더를 권하여 앞으로 밀어내니 알렉산더가 손짓하며 백성에게 변명하려 하나

sentences.original_text: And they drew Alexander out of the multitude
And Alexander beckoned with the hand
and would have made his defence unto the people
